name: To Stone!
flavor: You channel the Primordial Chaos into blows that petrify your foe... literally.

metadata.flavor: You channel the Primordial Chaos into blows that petrify your foe... literally.

effects.tier1: 9 + M damage; M < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
effects.tier2: 13 + M damage; M < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
effects.tier3: 18 + M damage; M < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While the target is slowed this way, any other effect that would make the target slowed instead makes them restrained by this ability. Additionally, a creature who fails the saving throw while restrained this way is petrified until they are given a supernatural cure or you choose to reverse the effect (no action required).
